txt.en: Fight your way up the stairs before you are overrun by reinforcements!
Scorched Brazier
Shadowy Brazier
'And we serve the master with Shadow and Flame!'
'Soldier! Front and centre!'
As the black armours fall to the ground, you hear the sounds of Orcs and Goblins fading. You have earned yourselves a brief respite.
'Where are my reinforcements?'
You hear the sound of reinforcements from below. You will need to force your way up the tower quickly or risk being overrun.
You hear heavy footsteps from just around the corner...you must be getting closer.
'You! Finish these puny creatures!'
'You have ventured far and fought hard to face your doom, puny mortals! Come then and learn the true meaning of despair.'
'Intruders have breached the lower level! Send down reinforcements to drive them out!'
'Ah, more spirits to sate my hunger!'
'Shadow and Flame are our master's tools...'
As the Nazg√ªl fades away, the fell-beast enrages!
'Let terror fall over you like a blanket of shadow...'
'And let fire consume your spirits on your way to oblivion!'
'Sister, no! Curse you all! You will burn for this!'
'NO! How dare you, you insolent fools! I will see you fall into shadow before this day is done!'
'Cowards! Cheats! We will not be lured away from our abode so easily!'
'Insolent wretches! I will deal with you shortly!'
'Such a shame to come so far only to fail.'
'Very well then mortals, my pet has toyed with you long enough....'
'I will take to the sky and bring down terror to you all!'
You hear the shouts of new reinforcements in the nearby halls of the lower floors.  They are coming...
The reinforcements have arrived, you will need to fight your way through the gauntlet once more.
The reinforcements are about to arrive, this is your last chance.
